title: Mobile Engineer Interview Guide
description: Prepare for iOS, Android, and cross-platform mobile interviews.

content.text: Mobile interviews assess platform-specific knowledge (iOS/Android), app architecture, performance optimization, and general programming skills. Expect coding challenges, design discussions, and platform deep dives.

**What interviewers assess:**

- Platform expertise (iOS/Swift or Android/Kotlin)
- Mobile architecture patterns (MVVM, Clean Architecture)
- UI/UX implementation skills
- Performance and memory management
- App lifecycle and background processing

**Typical mobile interview loop:**

1. **Recruiter screen** (30 min)
2. **Technical phone screen** (45-60 min) - Coding or platform questions
3. **Onsite/Virtual loop** (4-5 hours):
   - Platform-specific deep dive
   - Coding/algorithm round
   - Mobile system design
   - Behavioral round
Be ready to discuss trade-offs between native and cross-platform approaches. Know when each makes sense.

items.text: Practice coding problems in Swift or Kotlin
Prepare to discuss apps you've built or contributed to
Understand app store guidelines and release processes
Be ready to discuss performance optimization techniques
